snippet: LOVETT--Lawrence. The board, musicians and staff of The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center mourn the passing of Lawrence Dow Lovett, who served as Board Chairman from 1988 to 1993. Larry succeeded founder Alice Tully as Chairman, and continued her success as a charismatic, unifying leader. He brought great elegance and style to the daily workings of the Society and to our annual benefits which thrived under his leadership. He introduced many music lovers among his large circle of friends to the Society and left an indelible legacy on which we continue to build. He will be much missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LOVETT--Lawrence. The board, musicians and staff of The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center mourn the passing of Lawrence Dow Lovett, who served as Board Chairman from 1988 to 1993. Larry succeeded founder Alice Tully as Chairman, and continued her success as a charismatic, unifying leader. He brought great elegance and style to the daily workings of the Society and to our annual benefits which thrived under his leadership. He introduced many music lovers among his large circle of friends to the Society and left an indelible legacy on which we continue to build. He will be much missed. 1/3
